Key Match Events: Ireland defeated England by 5 runs via the Duckworth-Lewis method
Andy Balbirnie scored a 47-ball 62 for his 8th T20I fifty
Liam Livingstone and Mark Wood took 3 wickets each
Post-Match Reflections: Eleven years ago at the ODI World Cup in India, Kevin O'Brien had inspired a stunning win over England at the Chinnaswamy. Overall, this was Ireland's third win over England in a World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Ireland's maiden win in the second stage of the T20 World Cup
Others: The Ireland win has now opened the doors for Australia as five of the six teams in the group now have two points each
